title: Trapped in a Video Game: Book Four
description: Alistair Gregory, the man who figured out how to put people into video games, is not what he seems. Jesse Rigsby is sure of that. Jesse’s sure of something else too — he’s being watched. To unravel the mystery, Jesse’s going to have to transform himself into a superspy with serious retro gaming skills. Can he pull it off before the bad guys catch on?Trapped in a Video Game 4 is the newest addition to Dustin Brady's best-selling Trapped in a Video Game series. It's perfect for boys age 9-12, as well as anyone who loves a fun, fast-paced read.
author: Dustin Brady
